pullrequest.title: Use separate library names for AtlasSimInterface versions and avoid hardcoded linking

content.raw:
I did a quick test building packages locally, and it seems to work just fine. You can guess it with ldd, against AtlasPlugin and AtlasV3Plugin libraries. It only should appear the name of the library, not the path.

I need to investigate a bit more what is happening with the full library path in cmake. I would recommend the general approach of using -L to include link directories and -l library name, which in cmake is done using link_directories (or set_target_properties, be careful with the last one in precise, it is not fully supported) and target_link_libraries with just the library name.
